data.prayer: Lord, make the 1,703 believers in Mokhotlong to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 11,297 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mokhotlong, Lesotho
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Mokhotlong, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Mokhotlong.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Mokhotlong, Lesotho to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Mokhotlong. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 2 new simple churches in the state of Mokhotlong, Lesotho. Place a simple church in every community of the 13,000 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Mokhotlong, Lesotho to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.
